blackJack

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackJack.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    This class generates a deck/decks of cards. An instance of this class either generates a single deck of cards (52 cards), or a deck of cards consisting of multiple decks of cards (depending on which contructor is called). The cards in the deck/s are represented by Strings e.g. "S10" where "S" represents Spades, and "10" represents card value 10.
    Author:
    David

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      Default constructor sets number of decks to 1.
      Deck(int numberOfDecks)
      Constructor that specifies the number of decks used in a large deck of cards.

      Returns the cards in play as an ArrayList.
      int getCardValue()
      Returns the card value (1-13) of the last drawn card.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDeck()
      Returns the deck as an ArrayList.
      int getNumberOfDecks()
      Returns the number of decks.
      void shuffle()
      Shuffles the deck.

    • Method Detail

      • drawCard

        public java.lang.String drawCard()
        Draws a random card from the deck. If this method is called when the deck is empty, it will throw an exception.
        Returns:
        random card as a String e.g. "S10".

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Shuffles the deck.

      • getDeck

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDeck()
        Returns the deck as an ArrayList.
        Returns:
        ArrayList with the deck.

      • getCardsInPlay

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getCardsInPlay()
        Returns the cards in play as an ArrayList.
        Returns:
        ArrayList with the cards in play.

      • getNumberOfDecks

        public int getNumberOfDecks()
        Returns the number of decks.
        Returns:
        int with the number of decks.

      • getCardValue

        public int getCardValue()
        Returns the card value (1-13) of the last drawn card.
        Returns:
        int with the card value of the last drawn card.
